history.proof: intros p H. unfold iad_conv_prop in H. unfold iad_conv_prop. unfold iad_conv_aux_0. right. left. exists p. shelve.

exceptions.exn: In environment p : positive H : (exists q : positive, p = iad_conv_aux_0 q) \\/ (exists q : positive, p = iad_conv_aux_1 q) \\/ (exists q r : positive, p = iad_conv_aux_2 q r) Unable to unify "iad_conv_aux_1 p" with "(p~0~1)%positive".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall p : positive, iad_conv_prop p -> iad_conv_prop p~0~1

Premises:
iad_conv_prop = fun p : positive => (exists q : positive, p = iad_conv_aux_0 q) \/ (exists q : positive, p = iad_conv_aux_1 q) \/ (exists q r : positive, p = iad_conv_aux_2 q r) : positive -> Prop Argument scope is [positive_scope]
Inductive positive : Set := xI : positive -> positive | xO : positive -> positive | xH : positive For xI: Argument scope is [positive_scope] For xO: Argument scope is [positive_scope]
iad_conv_surj_0 : forall p : positive, iad_conv_prop p -> iad_conv_prop p~0~0
iad_conv_surj_1 : forall p : positive, iad_conv_prop p -> iad_conv_prop p~1~0
positive_rec : forall P : positive -> Set, (forall p : positive, P p -> P (p~1)%positive) -> (forall p : positive, P p -> P (p~0)%positive) -> P 1%positive -> forall p : positive, P p
positive_ind : forall P : positive -> Prop, (forall p : positive, P p -> P (p~1)%positive) -> (forall p : positive, P p -> P (p~0)%positive) -> P 1%positive -> forall p : positive, P p
positive_sind : forall P : positive -> SProp, (forall p : positive, P p -> P (p~1)%positive) -> (forall p : positive, P p -> P (p~0)%positive) -> P 1%positive -> forall p : positive, P p
positive_rect : forall P : positive -> Type, (forall p : positive, P p -> P (p~1)%positive) -> (forall p : positive, P p -> P (p~0)%positive) -> P 1%positive -> forall p : positive, P p
Pos.peanoView_xI : forall p : positive, Pos.PeanoView p -> Pos.PeanoView p~1
Pos.PeanoSucc : forall p : positive, Pos.PeanoView p -> Pos.PeanoView (Pos.succ p)
Pos.sub_mask_pos : forall p q : positive, (q < p)%positive -> exists r : positive, Pos.sub_mask p q = Pos.IsPos r
Pos.lt_le_incl : forall p q : positive, (p < q)%positive -> (p <= q)%positive
Pos.le_trans : forall n m p : positive, (n <= m)%positive -> (m <= p)%positive -> (n <= p)%positive
Inductive PeanoView : positive -> Set := PeanoOne : Pos.PeanoView 1 | PeanoSucc : forall p : positive, Pos.PeanoView p -> Pos.PeanoView (Pos.succ p) For PeanoView: Argument scope is [positive_scope] For PeanoSucc: Argument scopes are [positive_scope _]
EnvRing.env_morph : forall (R : Type) (radd rmul : R -> R -> R) (C : Type) (phi : C -> R) (p : EnvRing.Pol C) (e1 e2 : positive -> R), (forall x : positive, e1 x = e2 x) -> EnvRing.Pphi radd rmul phi e1 p = EnvRing.Pphi radd rmul phi e2 p

Pos.add_1_l : forall p : positive, (1 + p)%positive = Pos.succ p
Pos2Nat.inj_xO : forall p : positive, Pos.to_nat p~0 = 2 * Pos.to_nat p
Pos.square_xI : forall p : positive, (p~1 * p~1)%positive = ((p * p + p)~0~1)%positive
Pos2Z.inj_xI : forall p : positive, Z.pos p~1 = (2 * Z.pos p + 1)%Z
Pos2Z.pos_xI : forall p : positive, Z.pos p~1 = (2 * Z.pos p + 1)%Z
Pos2Z.neg_xI : forall p : positive, Z.neg p~1 = (2 * Z.neg p - 1)%Z

Pos.pred_double_succ : forall p : positive, Pos.pred_double (Pos.succ p) = (p~1)%positive

Pos.compare_xI_xI : forall p q : positive, (p~1 ?= q~1)%positive = (p ?= q)%positive
Pos.mul_xO_r : forall p q : positive, (p * q~0)%positive = ((p * q)~0)%positive
Pos.mul_comm : forall p q : positive, (p * q)%positive = (q * p)%positive
Pos.add_comm : forall p q : positive, (p + q)%positive = (q + p)%positive
Pos.add_xI_pred_double : forall p q : positive, ((p + q)~0)%positive = (p~1 + Pos.pred_double q)%positive

Pos.mul_xI_r : forall p q : positive, (p * q~1)%positive = (p + (p * q)~0)%positive
Pos.compare_xO_xI : forall p q : positive, (p~0 ?= q~1)%positive = Pos.switch_Eq Lt (p ?= q)%positive

Pos.add_assoc : forall p q r : positive, (p + (q + r))%positive = (p + q + r)%positive
